51833.「どうやら 女神の紅蓮石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようだな。:
The Red Goddess Gem has been safely offered
to the River of Light.

51836.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: A voice can be heard echoing from afar...

51838.<center>六聖陣は アストルティアに\nあまたいる 英雄 聖者の中から\n:
The Six Saints were chosen from among the
greatest of Astoltia's champions and
protectors.

51839.<center>六聖陣とは 招かれざる魔族どもから\nアストルティアを守る 聖な:
The Six Saints are the divine shield of
Astoltia, protecting against those unwelcome
demons...

51840.<center>魔族どもの暗躍を阻止せんと 彼らは\n従者である聖使者らを率いて:
To thwart the demons, the Saints led their followersーknown as the Holy Messengersー to a foreign world. Through many sacrifices,
they emerged victorious.

51841.<center>魔瘴の荒ぶりし時が 巡りくるたび\n新たな六聖陣が生まれ いつ果:
Each time the miasma erupts, a new Six Saints
are born, and a holy war with no end in sight
rages on...
